data.description:
Designed for casual fans or aspiring pros, Tennis League VR delivers the thrill of intense rallies and the triumph of landing the perfect ace. Use real tennis techniques to dominate the leaderboards and smash the competition. Virtual champions can play solo or online across a variety of game modes.

changelog.change_log:
- Sound effects improvements
- Many bugfixes across the whole game

Tennis League VR is OUT NOW on Meta Quest Store! 
Click the button on the blackboard (in the home environment) to go directly to the store page!

~ New movement control option, thumbsticks ~
 You can now move freely around the court using the analog stick of either of your Quest controllers. Please note that the default movement is still teleport - if you wish to play using analog sticks, you can activate the option from the settings menu

 ~ Improved physics and swing control ~
 Your shots are now more precise than ever

 ~ Other UI/UX improvements ~
Physics improvements for better control on rally shots

- Fixed a bug that would break handedness change on certain occasions

- General performance improvements
The new demo comes with a lot of visuals updates e gameplay improvements based on users' feedback.
Developer Data Use Policy compliance update.
